text: It's Official: With “Vermin,” Trump Is Now Using Straight-up Nazi Talk … We've all often wondered whether Donald Trump understands the historical import of what comes out of his mouth.  He's so ill-informed, so proudly ignorant, that it's easy to think that when he hurls a historical insult, he just doesn't know.
